author: Stockmrktnewb
text:
These are just my thoughts.

I am holding a small position in $TXTM, but am thinking of increasing my investment to bring down my average. I plan to hold and see what happens. I like what the company is trying to do and think there is at least another run to .003. 

 It will take some time for the license, but I think it has more to do with South Africa's political turmoil than anything else. 

The ICO is taking a little longer than some people want. I am expecting it sometime in March, but it could take longer.
